primary.name: NewSpace Index
primary.description: Comprehensive database of satellite constellations worldwide

constellations.name: Starlink
constellations.description: World's largest satellite constellation providing high-speed, low-latency internet globally.

constellations.name: OneWeb
constellations.description: Global LEO constellation focused on B2B connectivity, backhaul, and government services.

constellations.name: Project Kuiper
constellations.description: Amazon's planned LEO broadband constellation to compete with Starlink globally.

constellations.name: IRIS²
constellations.description: EU sovereign secure satellite constellation for government, defense, and commercial services.

constellations.name: Guowang (国网)
constellations.description: China's state-owned mega-constellation for domestic and global internet services.

constellations.name: Qianfan (千帆/G60)
constellations.description: Shanghai's commercial LEO constellation, first Chinese mega-constellation to begin deployment.

constellations.name: Sfera (Сфера)
constellations.description: Russia's planned sovereign constellation for internet and IoT services.

constellations.name: Telesat Lightspeed
constellations.description: High-capacity LEO constellation optimized for enterprise, maritime, and aviation.

constellations.name: SES mPOWER
constellations.description: High-throughput MEO constellation for government and enterprise communications.

constellations.name: Planet (Dove/SuperDove)
constellations.description: Largest Earth imaging constellation capturing entire land surface daily.

constellations.name: BlackSky
constellations.description: High-revisit imaging constellation with AI-powered analytics and rapid tasking.

constellations.name: Spire Global
constellations.description: Multi-purpose constellation for weather, maritime tracking, and aviation data.

constellations.name: Iridium NEXT
constellations.description: Only constellation providing true pole-to-pole global coverage for voice and data.

constellations.name: Copernicus (Sentinel)
constellations.description: EU's flagship Earth observation program providing free, open data globally.

constellations.name: GLONASS
constellations.description: Russian global navigation satellite system. Alternative/complement to GPS.

constellations.name: Galileo
constellations.description: EU's global navigation satellite system offering high-accuracy positioning services.

constellations.name: BeiDou-3
constellations.description: China's global navigation system providing positioning, navigation and timing services.

constellations.name: SpaceMobile
constellations.description: First space-based cellular broadband network connecting directly to unmodified smartphones.

constellations.name: ViaSat-3
constellations.description: Ultra-high capacity GEO constellation delivering terabit-class global broadband.

constellations.name: Globalstar
constellations.description: LEO constellation providing voice, data, and IoT services, partnering with Apple for satellite SOS.

constellations.name: ICEYE
constellations.description: World's largest SAR satellite constellation offering persistent monitoring capabilities.

constellations.name: Lynk Global
constellations.description: Direct-to-phone satellite network providing SMS and emergency services to standard cell phones.

constellations.name: WorldView Legion
constellations.description: Next-generation high-resolution imaging constellation with 15 revisits per day capability.

constellations.name: GHGSat
constellations.description: World's first and only high-resolution satellite constellation dedicated to monitoring greenhouse gas emissions.

constellations.name: Capella Space
constellations.description: Commercial SAR constellation delivering sub-meter resolution imagery with rapid tasking.

constellations.name: Satellogic
constellations.description: Cost-effective constellation providing multispectral and hyperspectral Earth imaging.

constellations.name: Hongyan (鸿雁)
constellations.description: China's global mobile satellite system for voice, data, and IoT services.

constellations.name: Rivada Networks
constellations.description: Enterprise-focused LEO constellation with unique network architecture for secure communications.

constellations.name: E-Space
constellations.description: Sustainability-focused LEO constellation designed for responsible space operations.

constellations.name: Hanwha Aerospace
constellations.description: South Korean SAR Earth observation constellation for government and commercial applications.

constellations.name: Omnispace
constellations.description: Global 5G non-terrestrial network providing direct connectivity to standard devices.

constellations.name: Kepler Communications
constellations.description: IoT connectivity constellation with unique store-and-forward architecture for global data relay.

constellations.name: Pixxel
constellations.description: India-based hyperspectral imaging constellation providing detailed spectral data for agriculture, mining, and environmental monitoring.

constellations.name: Foresight (Space42)
constellations.description: UAE's commercial SAR constellation for persistent Earth observation and monitoring.

constellations.name: Astranis MicroGEO
constellations.description: Small GEO satellites providing dedicated broadband capacity for underserved regions.

constellations.name: Mangata Networks
constellations.description: Multi-orbit constellation combining HEO and MEO satellites for global enterprise connectivity.

constellations.name: IRIDE
constellations.description: Italian national constellation of constellations for Earth observation including SAR, optical and hyperspectral sensors.

constellations.name: Kuva Space
constellations.description: Finnish hyperspectral smallsat constellation for agriculture, forestry, and environmental monitoring.

constellations.name: Kinéis
constellations.description: French IoT constellation providing global connectivity for asset tracking and environmental monitoring.

constellations.name: Umbra
constellations.description: Commercial SAR constellation delivering highest-resolution SAR imagery commercially available.

constellations.name: StriX
constellations.description: Japanese commercial SAR constellation for infrastructure monitoring and disaster response.

constellations.name: Swarm (SpaceX)
constellations.description: Ultra-small satellite IoT network acquired by SpaceX for global asset tracking and telemetry.

constellations.name: ORBCOMM OG2
constellations.description: Global M2M/IoT satellite network for industrial and logistics applications.

constellations.name: GPS III
constellations.description: US Global Positioning System providing worldwide navigation, timing, and positioning services.

constellations.name: Sky Perfect JSAT
constellations.description: Japanese next-generation HTS constellation for broadband and mobility services in Asia-Pacific.

constellations.name: Open Cosmos
constellations.description: UK-based end-to-end satellite solutions provider operating Earth observation missions.

constellations.name: Wyvern Dragonette
constellations.description: Canadian hyperspectral imaging constellation delivering agricultural and environmental intelligence.

constellations.name: Meridian Space
constellations.description: Low-CAPEX LEO broadband constellation featuring proprietary multi-band reflectarray antenna technology, purpose-built for defense, government, and sovereign communications.

Validated.description: Operational or actively deploying satellites with confirmed funding and regulatory approval

Announced.description: Publicly announced project, may be in development or planning phase with uncertain timeline
